name: SEPA XML Generator
description: Generates SEPA XML files for credit transfer (SCT) or direct debits (SDD). You can also validate IBANs and generate mandates in PDF format.

api_methods.name: validate-iban
api_methods.description: Validates a set of IBANs. If valid, adds information about the bank that issued it, like BIC, bank name or country code.

utterances.utterance: Can you check if this IBAN is valid?
Is my IBAN correct?
Please validate this IBAN for me.
Does this IBAN belong to a valid bank account?
Can you verify the validity of this IBAN?
Is this IBAN associated with a legitimate bank?
Could you confirm if this IBAN is active?
Check if this IBAN is registered with a bank.
Is this IBAN valid for international transfers?
Can you tell me if this IBAN is valid and provide bank details?
